Test case Name: TC01 Verify updated error message  should be displayed when user's myAccess request is approved & they are awaiting LOB access
Description: Verify updated error message  should be displayed when user's myAccess request is approved & they are awaiting LOB access
Actions: 1.Log in with new account who dont have access to LOB.                                                               2.Check whether the new error message is coming.
Expected Results: “Thank you for accessing the eZdocs URL. Your Access Central request has been approved by your manager. If you haven’t already, please submit a ServiceNow ticket via eWP Home - eWP Service Portal to request LOB access. If the ticket is already submitted, sit tight—your eZdocs account will be set up shortly. “ should be displayed
